formElement.label: Delete artifact versions older than
formElement.documentation: Indicate the numbers of days after which artifact versions should be deleted

formElement.label: Delete
formElement.documentation: If this option is not set, only report is done. No real data are deleted

formElement.label: Resource Name
formElement.documentation: The resource on which to run this job. The agent running on this resource must have access to the specified artifact cache directory. Note that if no artifact cache directory is specified, the job will cleanup the default artifact cache used by the resource.
